ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: well there are nice ones, but aren t exclusively clerics.  Like the bloodforge hammer, or midnight mallet. Good stats but not exclusively clerics.  i know some
ygData.messageBody:
well there are nice ones, but aren't exclusively clerics. Like the
bloodforge hammer, or midnight mallet. Good stats but not exclusively
clerics. i know some level 50 clerics that have never seen a cleric only
wep.
Allsar
-----Original Message-----
From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, July 10, 1999 12:02 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire


>From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
>
>Paladins suck at higher lvls.. cleric's don't. We don't need the damn
>sword when we have our undead spells. No other class can truely solo
>yellows. And.. who says there isn't a mace or hammer for us clerics.
